MAN.TITLE: drawnow

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a handle or a list of handles of type axes.

DESCRIPTION.P: This function can be used to draw the hidden graphics entities and all its chidren. The Visibility property of the current axes (no argument), or the axes entity(ies) (represented by the handle h or list of handles) or the current figure ('all') is set to "on" .
It can specially be used with the drawlater function.
